Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time it takes 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time it takes 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to be done after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum time until 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' is performed after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Time until 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' from the start of the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' across all variants where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Average time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to lead to a 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in cases leading to 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE occurs

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in successful cases (leading to 'Payment Handled')
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'
